scenario_text.value:
Can you believe how nice it is? You’d never
think the fog could have been so thick.

It kind of feels like proof that what we did
was right.

Doesn’t it? It makes me want to keep going!
Lets me think everything’s going to work out.

It’s not always good to be too optimistic,
Saki.

I know, but it’s not like being all gloomy is
going to help things either.

I’m sure we’ll be able to save Miyuki, just
like the kids here!

Right. As long as we work together, I just
know we can save her.

I hope things go well with the Holy
Beasts, too.

Maybe we won’t need to use force for them to
acknowledge us, and we can talk things out.
I’d love it if that were true...

(Sounds like a long shot to me. I’m sure the
Four Holy Beasts will want to test us.)

(But if I say it’ll definitely come to
a fight, won’t that just upset Saki?)

(Should I tell her we may not have to fight,
even if it’s just to ease her mind?)
(What should I say to her?)
Can’t avoid a fight.
I honestly don’t know.
Maybe we won’t fight?
I don’t think we can avoid a fight.

I get the feeling the Four Holy Beasts
will want to test our strength.

They’ll be looking to see that we’re not just
a bunch of weak humans who are all talk.

Yeah, that makes sense. I kind of knew that
already.
You accept it just like that?

I don’t want to fight, but if it means
they’ll come to trust us, I guess we have to.

Besides, you said it before, didn’t you?
It’ll be all good!

Umm, well I wonder? We don’t know a thing
about our opponents, so...

Time out, what is this? You’re being all
wishy-washy now!

You think the Four Holy Beasts will
help us out with that attitude?

Yeah, Takuma, you’ve got to talk loud and
proud, or they won’t believe in us!
I’m sorry...

I bet the way we think’s gonna be really
important here.

What we think, and the courage to say it with
conviction.

No, it’ll be okay! Maybe we won’t even have
to fight! I bet! I...I think.

Hoh, boy... Takuma, you have a thing or two
to learn about making a lady feel better.
Y-you think?

We’ll probably have to end up fighting. I get
that.

Just like we don’t know about the Four
Holy Beasts, they don’t know about us.

I dunno, it’s like... They wanna see if we’re
worth being trusted, or something?

That’s why we need more than words. We’ll
have to show them what we’re capable of.

You know, there’s a lot that we’ve learned
since we came here, Takuma.

And I think one of those things is that words
and actions are equally important.

We can value them both just the same, don’t
you think?
Yeah, I just know we can do it.

Me too! And I’m going to help make sure of
it!
Yeah, we’d better give it all we got, Saki!

We’ll make this work somehow! Let’s make it
happen!
